channel.title: C on Home page of Debamitro Chakraborti
channel.description: Recent content in C on Home page of Debamitro Chakraborti

item.title: Making the Same Mistake for a Decade
item.description: Today I saw I had made the same mistake twice in a month. It is a rather harmless-looking mistake in C. I first saw it in 2006, barely a year after I started working as a software engineer. Someone was having a crash only with a 64-bit build. Two people were looking into it and I somehow got involved. A function was returning a pointer to a structure and dereferencing this pointer was causing a crash.
